channel.title: Ncp help!
channel.description:
This is a post on an old question of mine that was never answered!
[quote="Bigbucks, post:10, topic:224879"]lol cool! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 05:46:35 pm[/size][hr]i can see it now....the deadly cows of lumby fields!! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 05:52:07 pm[/size][hr]I used the following code and the server wouldnt run
spawn = 81 3246 3290 0 3251 3290 3251 3287 1 cow[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 07:27:34 pm[/size][hr]Bump![/quote]

item.title: Ncp help!
item.dc:creator: @Bigbucks Bigbucks
item.description:
@Bigbucks wrote:

It was how do i put ncps like cows on there…i copyed someones code and put it on there with the stuff changed…why wont it work though…oh and how do i find out what NCPs IDs are?

Read full topic
